Package test.java.com.warzone.entities

Class CountryTest

java.lang.Object
test.java.com.warzone.entities.CountryTest
public class CountryTest extends Object
Provides comprehensive test coverage for the Country class, focusing on validating the functionality of ID, name, continent presence, and adjacency relationship management. This includes testing the retrieval and assignment of country properties and the integrity of the adjacency relationships.
